press_lever.description: Press the toilet lever to flush water.

clean_lever.description: Clean the lever to remove any dirt and germs.

close_seat.description: Close the toilet seat by moving it to a downward position.

clean_opened_seat.description: Wipe the opened toilet seat to clean it.

flush_with_opened_seat.description: Flush the toilet when the seat is open.

open_seat.description: Open the toilet seat by moving it to an upward position.

clean_closed_seat.description: Wipe the closed toilet seat to clean it.

flush_with_closed_seat.description: Flush the toilet when the seat is closed.

clean_toilet_body.description: Clean the toilet body to remove any stains or dirt.

clean_whole_toilet.description: Clean the entire toilet including the toilet body, the lever, and the seat.
